actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-870.

official_title: Resolution authorizing expenditures by the committee on Appropriations.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that the Senate Committee on Appropriations is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $75,000, in addition to the amount and for the same purposes specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 and in Senate Resolution 116, 93rd Congress.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing expenditures by the committee on Appropriations.
